actionPackage

Class UseAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • actionPackage.ActionAdapter<Item>
      • actionPackage.UseAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Action

    public class UseAction
extends ActionAdapter<Item>
    Specific action which permit to use several objects defined in the 'objects' package.
    Author:
    Pereira and Despelchin

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute(Player player)
        Execute the 'use' action. As this said, it use an item to a given player.
        Parameters:
        player - - the player who execute the action

      • isPossible

        public boolean isPossible(Player player,
                          AdventureGame adventureGame)
        Description copied from interface: Action
        Check if this action is possible in this room
        Parameters:
        player - - check if the player can do the action in the current room
        adventureGame - - the tabletop of the current game where the current room is, with a player inside
        Returns:
        true if the current action is possible in that moment of the game
